titleStmt.title: A true relation of the cruel dealings of William Pocklington of North Collingham in the county of Nottingham, with the innocent people of God called Quakers, in the same county.

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given forth the 12th month (called February) 1667. from us who are called Quakers.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
